title: Blast in Syria' Aleppo kills 5 people
description: DAMASCUS， May 5 (Xinhua) -- At least five people were killed in an explosion in Syria's northern Aleppo province， a pro-government news website reported.
cleanContent: DAMASCUS, May 5 (Xinhua) -- At least five people were killed in an explosion in Syria's northern Aleppo province, a pro-government news website reported.The report said the blast occurred at a car-washing shop in Tal Zarazir area, but there has been no immediate word from officials about the incident.Also on Saturday, local media reported blasts of explosive device in the capital Damascus' suburb of Joubar that left only material damages.Another blast occurred in the heart of Damascus Saturday, when two explosive devices planted under a military pickup truck went off at al-Khuja market and left also property losses.																																																																								|  |
